Summary: Never seen before...about 10 red lights, forming a triangle/boomerang.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Rio Grande
There were no other sightings in Rio Grande on or around February 24th 2009
divs: sighting details at 00:55 of 2009\02\24, i saw a red ligths formating a kind of triangle\boomerang for about 30 seconds. no sound, they came from south e went to north. i was surprised, and coulndt count, but were about 10 red ligths, forming a v, with the corner in its front. sorry for bad english. i lose sight when they went for the horinzont.
